name: Pack
description:
Pack allows you to generate a circle packing pattern withing a frame.


Circle packing is the process of arranging circles within a given boundary such that none of them overlap.


Usage

  1. Select a Frame to being
  2. Bring up Pack from the plugin context menu
  3. Select which shape to render


Pack offers two choices: square or circle. This is the shape that will be used to generate the pattern.
